exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.description: A compound exercise targeting the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings
instructions: Set up the barbell in a squat rack at about chest height
Position the bar on your upper traps and step back
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out
Lower your body by bending at the hips and knees
Descend until your thighs are parallel to the floor
Drive through your heels to return to the starting position

exercises.name: Conventional Deadlift
exercises.description: A compound exercise targeting the posterior chain
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot
Bend at hips and knees to grip the bar with hands just outside legs
Keep chest up and back neutral
Drive through heels and extend hips and knees simultaneously
Stand tall with shoulders back
Lower the bar back to the floor with control

exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: A compound exercise primarily targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps
instructions: Lie on bench with eyes under the bar
Grip the bar with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width
Unrack the bar and position it over your chest
Lower the bar to your chest with control
Press the bar back up to the starting position
Keep feet flat on the floor throughout the movement

exercises.name: Barbell Overhead Press
exercises.description: A compound exercise targeting the shoulders, triceps, and core
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bar at shoulder level
Grip the bar with hands just outside shoulder width
Press the bar straight up overhead
Lock out arms at the top
Lower the bar back to shoulder level with control

exercises.name: Pull-up
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise targeting the back and biceps
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with arms fully extended
Use an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder width
Pull your body up until your chin is over the bar
Lower yourself back down with control
Avoid swinging or using momentum

exercises.name: Parallel Bar Dips
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps
instructions: Support yourself on parallel bars with arms extended
Lower your body by bending your elbows
Descend until your shoulders are below your elbows
Push back up to the starting position
Keep your body upright throughout the movement

exercises.name: Barbell Bent-Over Row
exercises.description: A compound exercise targeting the back muscles
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding a barbell
Hinge at the hips and lean forward about 45 degrees
Keep your back straight and core engaged
Pull the bar to your lower chest/upper abdomen
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the top
Lower the bar back down with control

exercises.name: Barbell Front Squat
exercises.description: A squat variation with the bar positioned on the front of the shoulders
instructions: Position the bar on your front delts and collarbones
Keep elbows high and chest up
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Squat down while keeping your torso upright
Drive through heels to return to starting position

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: A hip-hinge movement targeting the hamstrings and glutes
instructions: Hold a barbell with an overhand grip
Stand with feet hip-width apart
Hinge at the hips and push your hips back
Lower the bar while keeping it close to your legs
Feel a stretch in your hamstrings
Drive your hips forward to return to standing

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: An incline variation targeting the upper chest
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline
Lie on bench with eyes under the bar
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulder-width
Lower bar to upper chest
Press bar back up to starting position

exercises.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
exercises.description: A bench press variation emphasizing the triceps
instructions: Lie on bench and grip bar with hands closer than shoulder-width
Keep elbows close to your body
Lower bar to your chest
Press bar back up, focusing on tricep engagement

exercises.name: Sumo Deadlift
exercises.description: A deadlift variation with a wide stance
instructions: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width
Point toes out at 45-degree angles
Reach down and grip bar with hands inside your legs
Keep chest up and back straight
Drive through heels to stand up

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.description: A single-leg squat variation
instructions: Stand 2-3 feet in front of a bench
Place the top of one foot on the bench behind you
Lower your body until your front thigh is parallel to the floor
Push through your front heel to return to starting position
Complete all reps before switching legs

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description: A dynamic lunge variation
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Step forward with one leg into a lunge position
Lower your body until both knees are at 90 degrees
Push off your back foot and step forward into the next lunge
Continue alternating legs as you walk forward

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.description: A squat holding a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level
instructions: Hold a dumbbell vertically against your chest
Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder-width
Squat down while keeping your chest up
Go as low as you can while maintaining good form
Drive through heels to return to standing

exercises.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
exercises.description: A glute-focused exercise performed from a bench
instructions: Sit with your back against a bench, barbell over your hips
Plant feet firmly on the ground
Drive through heels and thrust hips up
Squeeze glutes at the top
Lower hips back down with control

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raises
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the calf muscles
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Rise up onto your toes as high as possible
Hold the top position briefly
Lower back down slowly
Feel the stretch in your calves at the bottom

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A machine-based leg exercise
instructions: Sit in the leg press machine
Place feet on the platform shoulder-width apart
Lower the weight until knees reach 90 degrees
Press through heels to extend legs
Don't lock knees completely at the top

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.description: A chest exercise using dumbbells
instructions: Lie on bench holding dumbbells at chest level
Press dumbbells up and slightly together
Lower dumbbells to chest level with control
Feel a stretch in your chest at the bottom
Press back up to starting position

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the chest
instructions: Lie on bench holding dumbbells above chest
With slight bend in elbows, lower dumbbells out to sides
Feel a stretch across your chest
Bring dumbbells back together above chest
Maintain the same arm position throughout

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A classic bodyweight chest exercise
instructions: Start in plank position with hands under shoulders
Lower your body until chest nearly touches the ground
Push back up to starting position
Keep your body in a straight line throughout
Don't let hips sag or pike up

exercises.name: Tricep Dips (Chair/Bench)
exercises.description: A bodyweight tricep exercise using a chair or bench
instructions: Sit on edge of chair/bench, hands gripping the edge
Slide your butt off the edge, supporting weight with arms
Lower your body by bending elbows
Push back up to starting position
Keep legs straight for more difficulty

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the triceps
instructions: Hold one dumbbell with both hands overhead
Lower the weight behind your head by bending elbows
Keep upper arms stationary
Extend elbows to return to starting position
Control the weight throughout the movement

exercises.name: Lateral Raises
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the side delts
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at your sides
Raise arms out to sides until parallel to floor
Lead with your pinkies, not your thumbs
Lower back down with control
Don't use momentum to lift the weights

exercises.name: Front Raises
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the front delts
instructions: Stand holding dumbbells in front of thighs
Raise one arm forward to shoulder height
Lower back down with control
Alternate arms or do both together
Keep core engaged throughout

exercises.name: Rear Delt Flyes
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the rear delts
instructions: Bend forward at hips holding dumbbells
Raise arms out to sides, squeezing shoulder blades
Focus on pulling with your rear delts
Lower back down with control
Keep a slight bend in your elbows

exercises.name: Chin-ups
exercises.description: A bodyweight pulling exercise with underhand grip
instructions: Hang from pull-up bar with underhand grip
Pull yourself up until chin is over the bar
Focus on pulling with your back muscles
Lower yourself down with control
Keep core engaged throughout

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: A machine exercise targeting the lats
instructions: Sit at lat pulldown machine with thighs secured
Grip the bar wider than shoulder-width
Pull bar down to upper chest
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Slowly return to starting position

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.description: A cable exercise for the back
instructions: Sit at cable row machine with feet on platform
Grip handle with both hands
Pull handle to your abdomen
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Slowly return to starting position

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.description: A bent-over rowing variation
instructions: Straddle the T-bar with feet hip-width apart
Bend at hips and grip the handles
Pull the bar to your chest
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Lower with control

exercises.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.description: A unilateral back exercise
instructions: Place one knee and hand on bench for support
Hold dumbbell in opposite hand
Pull dumbbell to your hip
Squeeze shoulder blade at the top
Lower with control

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.description: A cable exercise for rear delts and upper back
instructions: Set cable at face height with rope attachment
Pull rope toward your face
Separate hands at face level
Focus on squeezing shoulder blades
Return to starting position with control

exercises.name: Barbell Shrugs
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the traps
instructions: Hold barbell with arms extended
Shrug shoulders straight up
Hold briefly at the top
Lower shoulders back down
Don't roll shoulders forward or back

exercises.name: Barbell Bicep Curls
exercises.description: A classic bicep isolation exercise
instructions: Stand holding barbell with underhand grip
Keep elbows at your sides
Curl bar up toward chest
Squeeze biceps at the top
Lower back down with control

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.description: A bicep exercise with neutral grip
instructions: Hold dumbbells with neutral grip (palms facing each other)
Keep elbows at your sides
Curl weights up toward shoulders
Lower back down with control
Don't swing or use momentum

exercises.name: Preacher Curls
exercises.description: A bicep curl performed on a preacher bench
instructions: Sit at preacher bench with chest against pad
Hold barbell with underhand grip
Curl bar up, stopping just short of full extension
Lower back down with control
Don't let arms fully extend at bottom

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: An isometric core exercise
instructions: Start in push-up position
Lower to forearms, keeping body straight
Hold this position
Keep core tight and breathing steady
Don't let hips sag or pike up

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: A basic abdominal exercise
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent
Place hands behind head or across chest
Lift shoulders off the ground
Focus on contracting abs
Lower back down with control

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: A rotational core exercise
instructions: Sit with knees bent, feet off ground
Lean back slightly, keeping back straight
Rotate torso left and right
Touch ground beside hips with hands
Keep feet elevated throughout

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A dynamic core and cardio exercise
instructions: Start in plank position
Bring one knee toward chest
Quickly switch legs
Continue alternating at a fast pace
Keep hips level throughout

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A full-body exercise combining squat, plank, and jump
instructions: Start standing, then squat down
Place hands on ground and jump feet back to plank
Do a push-up (optional)
Jump feet back to squat position
Jump up with arms overhead

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: A classic cardio exercise
instructions: Start with feet together, arms at sides
Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead
Jump back to starting position
Maintain a steady rhythm
Land softly on balls of feet

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: A running-in-place cardio exercise
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Run in place, bringing knees toward chest
Pump arms as you would when running
Maintain a fast pace
Land on balls of feet

exercises.name: Treadmill Running
exercises.description: Cardio exercise on a treadmill
instructions: Step onto treadmill and start at slow speed
Gradually increase to comfortable running pace
Maintain proper running form
Use handrails only for balance, not support
Gradually decrease speed to cool down

exercises.name: Elliptical Training
exercises.description: Low-impact cardio exercise
instructions: Step onto elliptical and begin slow movement
Gradually increase resistance and speed
Use handles for upper body engagement
Maintain steady rhythm
Focus on smooth, controlled movements

exercises.name: Battle Ropes
exercises.description: High-intensity cardio using heavy ropes
instructions: Hold one end of rope in each hand
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Create waves by moving arms up and down
Maintain high intensity for set duration
Keep core engaged throughout

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: Plyometric exercise jumping onto a box
instructions: Stand facing a sturdy box or platform
Jump onto box, landing with both feet
Stand up fully on top of box
Step or jump back down
Reset and repeat

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.description: A dynamic hip-hinge movement
instructions: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width
Hold kettlebell with both hands
Hinge at hips and swing kettlebell between legs
Drive hips forward to swing kettlebell to chest height
Let gravity bring kettlebell back down

exercises.name: Farmer's Walk
exercises.description: A loaded carry exercise
instructions: Hold heavy dumbbells or weights at your sides
Stand tall with shoulders back
Walk forward with controlled steps
Keep core tight throughout
Maintain grip on weights

exercises.name: Wall Sits
exercises.description: An isometric leg exercise
instructions: Stand with back against wall
Slide down until thighs are parallel to ground
Keep knees at 90-degree angle
Hold this position
Keep back flat against wall

exercises.name: Step-ups
exercises.description: A unilateral leg exercise using a box or bench
instructions: Stand in front of box or bench
Step up with one foot onto the platform
Drive through heel to stand up completely
Step back down with control
Complete all reps before switching legs
